NodeLastChild.summary:
The read-only lastChild property of the interface
returns the last child of the node, or null if there are no child nodes.

blockquote.para:
Note: This property returns any type of node that is the last child of this one.
It may be a or a node.
If you want to get the last that is a child of another element,
consider using .

NodeLastChild.value: A that is the last child of the node, or null is there are no child nodes.
